Our process is easy and it works

Our proactive team and the custom-made portal will help and assist you at every stage.
01
Simple online application

Fill out our fast-online application Or let the dedicated manager do that for you.

Get your personalised loan scenario with comparison report in less than 60 seconds.

02
We find the right loan

Our broker services are free with access to over 35+ lenders.

We provide you with solutions as per your need and expert advice on products.

03
We’ll do the rest

Carry out all the legwork on your behalf.

Update and guide you from start to finish so that you stay away from all the hassles.

04
Automated tracking progress

Automated loan progress updates, with dedicated manager support.

Custom-built portal with built-in free resources is available to all customers.

05
Ongoing support promise

We promise ongoing support till the facility ends.

Free property report and regular loan health check for all our customers.

Compare us with other brokers or lenders

At Credit Hub we have been serving our customers for years, we have learned and dedicated ourself to always improving and adapting with time. Feel the difference with our service-oriented approach and advance technology. And we will keep doing this…
  • Us
    Company founded by experienced banker, over 20 years’ experience in the industry. We have a team of fully trained accredited dedicated manager and support.
  • Support
    Industry-first automated customer service portal and support, portfolio management by dedicated managers with ongoing account support.
  • Resources
    Experienced team to help you with your need. Free property report and Finance health check for our customers. Latest industry updates and news access.
  • Rewards
    Join the exclusive club and be rewarded discounts on other company services. Get cashback rewards for our referral program.
